oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stagville Accounts
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Business Accounts
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Cameron Family Papers are held at the Southern History Collection at UNC, and incldue substantial business records. Some of these record transactions between the plantation store and members of the community. Of particular interest to this conference is the "slave ledger"; a separate account book recording transactions between the Cameron store and and enslaved customers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Southern Historical Collection, Chapel Hill, NC, USA
